poem.title: Karma Gadelica
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
The Minch a glittering bridge to the ocean
A mishmash of beaches, machair and cliff
No midge is a nuisance
No pluke is a rash
No man is an island
Some of us, but,
Are nuisances and rash
Which accounts for sebacious eruptions
And burning clouds of midges
On Rhum.
